name: SANDAG'S SANDBAG: The SANDIG "Don't Dredge on Me!" Golden Yellow T-Shirt
description: As a serious parody off of the original, snake-coiled "Don't Tread on Me" Gadsden flag of the American Revolution, this golden-yellow, black-inked "Don't Dredge on Me" cotton t-shirt highlights the urgent cries of frustration from various ocean users (humans and wildlife) within the San Diego region, who have been adversely impacted by SANDAG's recent undersea and beach-dredging projects during the months of September to December of 2012 (and may resume into 2013). The very premise of San Diego Association of Government's dredging activities is to be questioned, for 22.5 million in state and local taxpayer dollars are being used largely for "beach beautification" over functional needs. The shirt centerpiece features the metaphorical "rattlesnake eel" that is looking to strike upon a sand-shifting SANDIG Liberty Island boat, which is also surrounded and barricaded by various protesting boaters, fishermen, divers, surfers, paddle-boarders, beach-goers, and the like. All purchases help support local businesses, as well as current and future Fishy Games media intervention projects that highlight urgent issues in San Diego and southern California marine communities. Feel free to download free posters HERE! And visit fishy-games.net for some ecopundit-TLC!

name: "SANDAG Dont Dredge on Me!" Digital Downloads + Licensing!
description:
Are you inspired to download a high resolution "SANDAG Don't Dredge on Me" Design for your personal use? Or license the graphic for your organization's projects? Aww, shucks! We're blushing!

This high quality graphic (delivered to you as a TIFF file) features the metaphorical "rattlesnake eel" that is looking to strike upon a sand-shifting SANDIG Liberty Island Boat, which is also surrounded and barricaded by a muckracking community of marine-oriented San Diegans.

You can download the files of choice BELOW for $1.99 through the Safe and Secure Google Checkout (and your files will be delivered instantly upon purchase), but if you are interested in licensing, please SCROLL DOWN to the BOTTOM of this page!

If you're jazzed about the golden-yellow "SANDAG Don't Dredge on Me" Design, please download a high resolution TIFF file for your personal use at $1.99 HERE!

If you're stoked about the pristine-white "SANDAG Don't Dredge on Me" Design, please download a high resolution TIFF file for your personal use at $1.99 HERE!
_______________________________________

If you are interested in licensing any of the above images, please FIRST visit our LICENSING LINGO HERE.

Then, continue HERE in THREE EASY STEPS:

(1). Download a high resolution TIFF file of choice (golden yellow or pristine white) for $1.99 ABOVE, which is the price for
personal use).

(2). Then, return to THE TOP of THIS PAGE and select from the various licensing options the scenario that most accurately describes how you will be using this design, and pay the appropriate licensing fee through the Safe and Secure BigCartel Checkout System.

If none of the options presented depict the circumstances of your particular project, then please EMAIL us HERE and we can swiftly figure out a price that is fair to the scope of
your work.

(3). And lastly, please fill out this form HERE and tell us a little bit about your project, and we the People and the Creatures at Fishy Games will promptly email you with a
go-ahead!
_______________________________________

But... if you're really low in chum change but still like the design, you can download free posters HERE for your political postering pleasure! And send some sonar through your social networks! Consider pitching in some fish feed!

Please feel free to CONTACT US with any intriguing inquiries, charismatic commentary, and/or skeptical suggestions!

Muchas smoochas for mutual admirations! Thank you from the folks at fishy-games.net!

name: FREE "SANDAG Don't Dredge on Me" Poster FREE!
description:
Feel like figuratively throwing some sandbags at SANDAG?!! Do you sense that you want your California State and City Taxpayer Dollars refunded on a questionable government project? Are you wondering who's going to pay for the unforeseen damage of homes and habitats?
Some psychological relief can be found here! Wear your inner thoughts on your sleeves by downloading a FREE "SANDAG Don't Dredge on Me!" POSTER, featuring the metaphorical "rattlesnake eel" that is looking to strike upon a sand-shifting SANDIG Liberty Island Boat, which is also surrounded and barricaded by a community of marine-oriented San Diegans.
Plaster this poster wherever you feel needs a voice of reason or some political punditry! Lightly golden poster: DOWNLOAD HERE Black and white poster: DOWNLOAD HERE If you have some spare chum change, feel free to donate above (thank you!). Otherwise, please visit fishy-games.net for some ecopundit-TLC, and many thanks for visiting this site!
